Volunteer Coordinator: Linda Hancock, Administrative Healing Support and Volunteer Coordinator; Phone: 250.861.7125; Email: volunteer-kel@inspirehealth.ca
Service Details: - Provides programs and services to enhance the quality of life, health, and well-being of people living with Cancer and their families- Offers Cancer rehabilitation services to support and educate people during and after cancer treatments- Offers clinical consultations with Physicians, Clinical Counsellors, Nutritionists, and Exercise Therapists
Cost: All our services, programs, and classes are free of charge
Meetings: Clinicians provide public info sessions from 3:30 - 4:30pm each Wednesday at our centre. The info session covers up to date research and our InspireHealth programs. A question and answer session follows.
Address & Map: Towne Centre Mall565 Bernard Ave, #123Kelowna, BC     V1Y 8R4
